name: Importance of Challenges
description:
Pen+ink+pencil on 300gsm paper

3rd piece in my Lettering Journey. A reliable sailor before was just a stranger to the sea (or didn't even know how to steer a ship). but after so many months of sailing the ocean, he can conquer various kinds of terrain even storms. This shows that challenges can make a person better. Lack of challenges in life can lead to lack of experience
